subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=읍|eumhun=|rv=eup|mr=ŭp|y=up}}

# {{lb|ko|geography}} [[town|Town]] or [[eup]], an [[administrative]] [[division]] [[larger]] and [[more]] [[populous]] than a [[ri]] ([[village]]) [[but]] [[smaller]] and [[less]] [[populous]] than a [[county]] ([[gun]]) or [[city]] ([[si]]).
